channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 12:19 Air alert in Kirovohrad region. Follow for further updates.
item.description: 🔴 12:19 Air alert in Kirovohrad region. Follow for further updates. #Kirovohrad_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
